dcterms:creator: A. Feder
N. Oved
U. Shalit
R. Reichart
dcterms:description: EEEC+ is a synthetic dataset designed to evaluate the impact of protected attributes (gender and race) on mood state classification. It includes observations labeled with binary gender, ternary race, and mood states, with genuine counterfactuals generated for each observation.
dcterms:title: EEEC+

dcterms:creator: E. D. Abraham

C. Potts
R. Reichart
Z. Wu
dcterms:description: CEBaB is a dataset for evaluating the causal effects of concepts on sentiment classification. It includes original restaurant reviews and human-edited counterfactual reviews, annotated with sentiment ratings at both the aspect and review levels.
dcterms:title: CEBaB

dcterms:creator: M. De-Arteaga
A. Romanov
H. Wallach
J. Chayes
C. Borgs
A. Chouldechova
S. Geyik
K. Kenthapadi
A. T. Kalai
dcterms:description: BiasInBios is a dataset for studying gender biases in biography classification tasks. It consists of biographies labeled with binary gender and occupation, highlighting the biases present in the classification process.
dcterms:title: BiasInBios
